arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "SELECT " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" AS \\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"WHERE " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM'"

"SELECT " +" TO_CHAR(SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH:mm:ss') AS \\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL, " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE " +"WHERE " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"CODE\\" " +" AND SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"SYS_CLASS\\" = 'SALES' " +" AND SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"CLASS_CODE\\" = 'PLANT_WEB'"

"SELECT " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"ODR_NO\\" AS \\"ODR_NO\\", " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" AS \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"ODR_CMPLT_FLG\\" AS \\"ODR_CMPLT_FLG\\" " +"FROM " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK " +"WHERE " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ? " +" AND T_ODR_UNSTOCK.DEL_FLG = '0'"
"SELECT " +" 1 " +"FROM " +" T_PJ_ODR_ALC " +"WHERE " +" T_PJ_ODR_ALC.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" T_ESTIMATE_DETAL.\\"PROJECT_CD\\" " +"FROM " +" T_ESTIMATE_DETAL, " +" T_PJ_ODR_ALC " +"WHERE " +" T_PJ_ODR_ALC.\\"PROJECT_CD\\" = T_ESTIMATE_DETAL.\\"PROJECT_CD\\" " +" AND T_PJ_ODR_ALC.\\"ESTIMATE_NO\\" = T_ESTIMATE_DETAL.\\"ESTIMATE_NO\\" " +" AND T_PJ_ODR_ALC.\\"DETAL_NO\\" = T_ESTIMATE_DETAL.\\"DETAL_NO\\" " +" AND T_PJ_ODR_ALC.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" TO_CHAR(T_SERVICE.\\"CTL_SEQ_CD\\") AS \\"CTL_SEQ_CD\\", " +" T_SERVICE.\\"SLIP_TRN_CD\\" AS \\"SLIP_TRN_CD\\", " +" T_SERVICE.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" AS \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"FROM " +" T_SERVICE " +"WHERE " +" T_SERVICE.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ? " +" AND T_SERVICE.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = '0'"

"SELECT " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"ODR_CMPLT_FLG\\" AS \\"ODR_CMPLT_FLG\\", " +" T_PJ_ODR_ALC.\\"PROJECT_CD\\" AS \\"PROJECT_CD\\", " +" T_PROJECT.\\"PROJECT_NAME\\" AS \\"PROJECT_NAME\\", " +" T_PJ_ODR_ALC.\\"ESTIMATE_NO\\" AS \\"ESTIMATE_NO\\", " +" T_PJ_ODR_ALC.\\"DETAL_NO\\" AS \\"DETAL_NO\\", " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" AS \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH:MM:SS') AS \\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\", " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\" AS \\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"USER_NAME\\" AS \\"USER_NAME\\", " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"ODR_QTY\\" AS \\"ODR_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.STOCK_UNIT AS \\"UNIT\\", " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"ODR_UNIT_PRICE\\" AS \\"ODR_UNIT_PRICE\\", " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_UNIT\\" AS \\"CUR_UNIT\\", " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"ODR_AMOUNT\\" AS \\"ODR_AMOUNT\\", " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"ODR_AMOUNT_EXCH_RATES\\" AS \\"ODR_AMOUNT_EXCH_RATES\\", " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"TAX_CD\\" AS \\"TAX_CD\\", " +" SYS_PARAMETER.\\"VALUE\\" AS \\"VALUE\\", " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"CUST_CD\\" AS \\"CUST_CD\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"CUST_NAME\\" AS \\"CUST_NAME\\", " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" AS \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"CUST_ODR_NO\\" AS \\"CUST_ODR_NO\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS \\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\" " +"FROM " +" T_PJ_ODR_ALC, " +" T_PROJECT, " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK, " +" USER_MST, " +" M_CUR, " +" M_CUST, " +" M_ITEM, " +" SYS_PARAMETER, " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL, " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE " +"WHERE " +" T_PJ_ODR_ALC.\\"PROJECT_CD\\" = T_PROJECT.\\"PROJECT_CD\\"(+) " +" AND T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\" = USER_MST.\\"USER_CD\\"(+) " +" AND SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"CODE\\" " +" AND SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"SYS_CLASS\\" = 'SALES' " +" AND SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"CLASS_CODE\\" = 'PLANT_WEB' " +" AND T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"CUST_CD\\" = M_CUST.\\"CUST_CD\\"(+) " +" AND T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\"(+) " +" AND SYS_PARAMETER.\\"NAME\\" = 'PJ_PAY_RATE' " +" AND M_CUST.\\"CUR_CD\\" = M_CUR.\\"CUR_CD\\"(+) " +" AND T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ? " +" AND T_PJ_ODR_ALC.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ? " +" AND T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = '0'"

"SELECT " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"OPTION_ID\\" AS \\"OPTION_ID\\", " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"INSTALL_FLG\\" AS \\"INSTALL_FLG\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS " +"WHERE " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"OPTION_ID\\" LIKE 'B%'"

"SELECT " +" 1 " +"FROM " +" T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN, " +" SYS_AR_CTRL " +"WHERE " +" SYS_AR_CTRL.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN.\\"SLIP_CTRL_GRP\\" = SYS_AR_CTRL.\\"SLIP_CTRL_GRP\\" " +" AND T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN.\\"SLIP_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN.\\"SLIP_TYP\\" = '14' " +" AND T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN.\\"SALES_MODIFICATION_FLG\\" = '0' " +" AND T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN.\\"INSPC_ACPT_CRCT_TYP\\" = '2' " +" AND T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN.\\"STATUS\\" < '40'"

"SELECT " +" 1 " +"FROM " +" T_AR_LEDGER_H, " +" SYS_AR_CTRL " +"WHERE " +" SYS_AR_CTRL.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_AR_LEDGER_H.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_AR_LEDGER_H.\\"SLIP_CTRL_GRP\\" = SYS_AR_CTRL.\\"SLIP_CTRL_GRP\\" " +" AND T_AR_LEDGER_H.\\"SLIP_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_AR_LEDGER_H.\\"SLIP_TYP\\" = '14' " +" AND T_AR_LEDGER_H.\\"SALES_MODIFICATION_FLG\\" = '0' " +" AND T_AR_LEDGER_H.\\"INSPC_ACPT_CRCT_TYP\\" = '2' " +" AND T_AR_LEDGER_H.\\"STATUS\\" < '40'"
"SELECT " +" SYS_PARAMETER.\\"VALUE\\" AS \\"VALUE\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_PARAMETER " +"WHERE " +" SYS_PARAMETER.\\"NAME\\" = 'PJ_PAY_RATE'"

"SELECT " +" T_SALES.\\"SLIP_CD\\" AS \\"SLIP_CD\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" AS \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"SALES_SEQ_NO\\" AS \\"SALES_SEQ_NO\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"AI_AR_IF_FLG\\" AS \\"AI_AR_IF_FLG\\" " +"FROM " +" T_SALES, " +" T_SERVICE " +"WHERE " +" T_SALES.SLIP_CD = T_SERVICE.\\"SLIP_TRN_CD\\" " +" AND T_SERVICE.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ? " +" AND T_SALES.DEL_FLG = '0'"
"SELECT " +" TO_CHAR(SEQ_SALES_SEQ_NO.NEXTVAL) AS \\"SALES_SEQ_NO\\" " +"FROM " +" DUAL"

"INSERT INTO " +" T_SALES(\\"SALES_SEQ_NO\\", \\"SLIP_CD\\", \\"SALES_TYP\\", \\"CUST_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"ITEM_NAME\\", \\"CUST_ODR_NO\\", \\"SALES_DATE\\", \\"SALES_DEPT_CD\\", \\"VEND_CD\\", \\"PRD_ODR_PLACE_CD\\", \\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\", \\"ODR_ACPT_PSN_CD\\", \\"SALES_QTY\\", \\"SALES_UNIT_PRICE\\", \\"UNIT_CD\\", \\"SALES_AMOUNT\\", \\"SALES_AMOUNT_EXCH_RATES\\", \\"INSPC_ACPT_DATE\\", \\"INSPC_ACPT_QTY\\", \\"EXTERNAL_TAX_SALES_AMOUNT\\", \\"INTERNAL_TAX_SALES_AMOUNT\\", \\"TAXFREE_SALES_AMOUNT\\", \\"TAX_CREDIT_SALES_AMOUNT\\", \\"EXTERNAL_TAX_AMOUNT\\", \\"INTERNAL_TAX_AMOUNT\\", \\"TAX_AMOUNT_1\\", \\"TAX_AMOUNT_2\\", \\"TAX_AMOUNT_3\\", \\"OWN_CUR_TAXCREDIT_SALES_AMOUNT\\", \\"ORG_SLIP_CD\\", \\"CURRNCY_CD\\", \\"SPCL_PRICE_CO\\", \\"REMARKS\\", \\"INSPC_ACPT_TYP\\", \\"STATUS\\", \\"DEL_FLG\\", \\"APPR_FLG\\", \\"APPR_ID\\", \\"APPR_DATE\\") " +"VALUES " +" (TO_NUMBER(?), ?, TO_NUMBER(?), ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), ?, TO_DATE(?))"

"SELECT " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"SALES_SEQ_NO\\") AS \\"SALES_SEQ_NO\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"SLIP_CD\\" AS \\"SLIP_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"SALES_TYP\\") AS \\"SALES_TYP\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"CUST_CD\\" AS \\"CUST_CD\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" AS \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"CUST_ODR_NO\\" AS \\"CUST_ODR_NO\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"SALES_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS \\"SALES_DATE\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"SALES_DEPT_CD\\" AS \\"SALES_DEPT_CD\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"VEND_CD\\" AS \\"VEND_CD\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"PRD_ODR_PLACE_CD\\" AS \\"PRD_ODR_PLACE_CD\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\" AS \\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"ODR_ACPT_PSN_CD\\" AS \\"ODR_ACPT_PSN_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"SALES_QTY\\" * - 1) AS \\"SALES_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"SALES_UNIT_PRICE\\") AS \\"SALES_UNIT_PRICE\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"UNIT_CD\\" AS \\"UNIT_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"SALES_AMOUNT\\" * - 1) AS \\"SALES_AMOUNT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"SALES_AMOUNT_EXCH_RATES\\" * - 1) AS \\"SALES_AMOUNT_EXCH_RATES\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"INSPC_ACPT_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS \\"INSPC_ACPT_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"INSPC_ACPT_QTY\\" * - 1) AS \\"INSPC_ACPT_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"EXTERNAL_TAX_SALES_AMOUNT\\" * - 1) AS \\"EXTERNAL_TAX_SALES_AMOUNT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"INTERNAL_TAX_SALES_AMOUNT\\" * - 1) AS \\"INTERNAL_TAX_SALES_AMOUNT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"TAXFREE_SALES_AMOUNT\\" * - 1) AS \\"TAXFREE_SALES_AMOUNT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"TAX_CREDIT_SALES_AMOUNT\\" * - 1) AS \\"TAX_CREDIT_SALES_AMOUNT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"EXTERNAL_TAX_AMOUNT\\" * - 1) AS \\"EXTERNAL_TAX_AMOUNT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"INTERNAL_TAX_AMOUNT\\" * - 1) AS \\"INTERNAL_TAX_AMOUNT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"TAX_AMOUNT_1\\" * - 1) AS \\"TAX_AMOUNT_1\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"TAX_AMOUNT_2\\" * - 1) AS \\"TAX_AMOUNT_2\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"TAX_AMOUNT_3\\" * - 1) AS \\"TAX_AMOUNT_3\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"OWN_CUR_TAXCREDIT_SALES_AMOUNT\\" * - 1) AS \\"OWN_CUR_TAXCREDIT_SALES_AMOUNT\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"ORG_SLIP_CD\\" AS \\"ORG_SLIP_CD\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"CURRNCY_CD\\" AS \\"CURRNCY_CD\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"SPCL_PRICE_CO\\" AS \\"SPCL_PRICE_CO\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"REMARKS\\" AS \\"REMARKS\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"INSPC_ACPT_TYP\\") AS \\"INSPC_ACPT_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SALES.\\"STATUS\\") AS \\"STATUS\\", " +" TO_CHAR(1) AS \\"DEL_FLG\\" " +"FROM " +" T_SALES " +"WHERE " +" T_SALES.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0 " +" AND T_SALES.\\"SALES_SEQ_NO\\" = ?"

"INSERT INTO " +" T_SERVICE(\\"CTL_SEQ_CD\\", \\"ODR_NO\\", \\"SLIP_TRN_CD\\", \\"SALES_DATE\\", \\"SALES_DEPT_CD\\", \\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\", \\"UNIT_COST\\", \\"SERVICE_QTY\\", \\"SERVICE_AMOUNT\\", \\"SERVICE_AMOUNT_EXCH_RATES\\", \\"TAX_CD\\", \\"CURRNCY_CD\\", \\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\", \\"CUST_ODR_NO\\", \\"CUST_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"ITEM_NAME\\", \\"REMARKS\\", \\"WORK_TIME\\", \\"RATE_PAY\\", \\"WORK_DATE\\", \\"WORK_PERSON_CD\\", \\"WORK_REMARKS\\") " +"VALUES " +" (TO_NUMBER(?), ?, ?, TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), ?, ?, TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), ?, ?)"

"INSERT INTO " +" HS_T_SERVICE(\\"CTL_SEQ_CD\\", \\"ODR_NO\\", \\"NEW_OLD_FLG\\", \\"TRAN_TYPE\\", \\"SLIP_CD\\", \\"CRCT_TYP\\", \\"SALES_DATE\\", \\"SALES_DEPT_CD\\", \\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\", \\"UNIT_COST\\", \\"SERVICE_AMOUNT\\", \\"SERVICE_AMOUNT_EXCH_RATES\\", \\"TAX_CD\\", \\"REMARKS\\", \\"WORK_TIME\\", \\"RATE_PAY\\", \\"WORK_DATE\\", \\"WORK_PERSON_CD\\", \\"WORK_REMARKS\\") " +"VALUES " +" (TO_NUMBER(?), ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), ?, ?)"

"UPDATE " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK " +"SET " +" \\"ODR_CMPLT_FLG\\" = '1', " +" \\"ODR_CMPLT_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +"WHERE " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = '0' " +" AND T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ?"
"SELECT " +" SYS_PARAMETER.\\"VALUE\\" AS \\"VALUE\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_PARAMETER " +"WHERE " +" SYS_PARAMETER.\\"NAME\\" = 'APR_SALES'"
"SELECT " +" T_SALES.\\"SLIP_CD\\" AS \\"SLIP_CD\\" " +"FROM " +" T_SALES " +"WHERE " +" T_SALES.\\"SLIP_CD\\" = ?"
"UPDATE " +" T_SALES " +"SET " +" \\"DEL_FLG\\" = 1 " +"WHERE " +" T_SALES.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0 " +" AND T_SALES.\\"SALES_SEQ_NO\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" T_SERVICE.\\"SLIP_TRN_CD\\" AS \\"SLIP_TRN_CD\\", " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"ODR_CMPLT_FLG\\" AS \\"ODR_CMPLT_FLG\\", " +" T_PJ_ODR_ALC.\\"PROJECT_CD\\" AS \\"PROJECT_CD\\", " +" T_PROJECT.\\"PROJECT_NAME\\" AS \\"PROJECT_NAME\\", " +" T_PJ_ODR_ALC.\\"ESTIMATE_NO\\" AS \\"ESTIMATE_NO\\", " +" T_PJ_ODR_ALC.\\"DETAL_NO\\" AS \\"DETAL_NO\\", " +" T_SERVICE.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" AS \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SERVICE.\\"SALES_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS \\"SALES_DATE\\", " +" T_SERVICE.\\"SALES_DEPT_CD\\" AS \\"SALES_DEPT_CD\\", " +" M_ORG.\\"ORG_NAME\\" AS \\"ORG_NAME\\", " +" T_SERVICE.\\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\" AS \\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"USER_NAME\\" AS \\"USER_NAME\\", " +" T_SERVICE.\\"SERVICE_QTY\\" AS \\"SERVICE_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" AS \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" T_SERVICE.\\"UNIT_COST\\" AS \\"UNIT_COST\\", " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_UNIT\\" AS \\"CUR_UNIT\\", " +" T_SERVICE.\\"SERVICE_AMOUNT\\" AS \\"SERVICE_AMOUNT\\", " +" T_SERVICE.\\"SERVICE_AMOUNT_EXCH_RATES\\" AS \\"SERVICE_AMOUNT_EXCH_RATES\\", " +" T_SERVICE.\\"TAX_CD\\" AS \\"TAX_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SERVICE.\\"WORK_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS \\"WORK_DATE\\", " +" T_SERVICE.\\"WORK_TIME\\" AS \\"WORK_TIME\\", " +" T_SERVICE.\\"RATE_PAY\\" AS \\"RATE_PAY\\", " +" T_SERVICE.\\"WORK_PERSON_CD\\" AS \\"WORK_PERSON_CD\\", " +" USER_MST_1.\\"USER_NAME\\" AS \\"USER_NAME\\", " +" T_SERVICE.\\"REMARKS\\" AS \\"REMARKS\\", " +" T_SERVICE.\\"WORK_REMARKS\\" AS \\"WORK_REMARKS\\", " +" T_SERVICE.\\"CUST_CD\\" AS \\"CUST_CD\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"CUST_NAME\\" AS \\"CUST_NAME\\", " +" T_SERVICE.\\"ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" AS \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" T_SERVICE.\\"CUST_ODR_NO\\" AS \\"CUST_ODR_NO\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SERVICE.\\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS \\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_SERVICE.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" AS \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"FROM " +" T_SERVICE, " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK, " +" T_PJ_ODR_ALC, " +" T_PROJECT, " +" M_ORG, " +" USER_MST, " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_CUR, " +" USER_MST USER_MST_1, " +" M_CUST " +"WHERE " +" T_PJ_ODR_ALC.\\"PROJECT_CD\\" = T_PROJECT.\\"PROJECT_CD\\"(+) " +" AND T_SERVICE.\\"SALES_DEPT_CD\\" = M_ORG.\\"ORG_CD\\"(+) " +" AND T_SERVICE.\\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\" = USER_MST.\\"USER_CD\\"(+) " +" AND T_SERVICE.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\"(+) " +" AND T_SERVICE.\\"CURRNCY_CD\\" = M_CUR.\\"CUR_CD\\"(+) " +" AND T_SERVICE.\\"WORK_PERSON_CD\\" = USER_MST_1.\\"USER_CD\\"(+) " +" AND T_SERVICE.\\"CUST_CD\\" = M_CUST.CUST_CD(+) " +" AND T_SERVICE.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ? " +" AND T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ? " +" AND T_PJ_ODR_ALC.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ? " +" AND T_SERVICE.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = '0'"

"SELECT " +" M_ORG.\\"ORG_CD\\" AS \\"ORG_CD\\", " +" M_ORG.\\"ORG_NAME\\" AS \\"ORG_NAME\\" " +"FROM " +" M_ORG, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"WHERE " +" M_ORG.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD " +" AND SYS_MY_COMPANY.CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM' " +" AND M_ORG.\\"ORG_CD\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" TO_CHAR(M_TAX.OLD_TAX_RATE_1) AS TAX_RATE_1, " +" TO_CHAR(M_TAX.OLD_TAX_RATE_2) AS TAX_RATE_2, " +" TO_CHAR(M_TAX.OLD_TAX_RATE_3) AS TAX_RATE_3, " +" TO_CHAR(M_TAX.ROUND_TYP) AS TAX_ROUND_TYP " +"FROM " +" M_TAX " +"WHERE " +" M_TAX.TAX_CD = ? " +" AND M_TAX.NEW_TAX_RATE_START_DATE > TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +"UNION ALL " +"SELECT " +" TO_CHAR(M_TAX.NEW_TAX_RATE_1) AS TAX_RATE_1, " +" TO_CHAR(M_TAX.NEW_TAX_RATE_2) AS TAX_RATE_2, " +" TO_CHAR(M_TAX.NEW_TAX_RATE_3) AS TAX_RATE_3, " +" TO_CHAR(M_TAX.ROUND_TYP) AS TAX_ROUND_TYP " +"FROM " +" M_TAX " +"WHERE " +" M_TAX.TAX_CD = ? " +" AND M_TAX.NEW_TAX_RATE_START_DATE <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD')"
"SELECT " +" USER_MST.\\"USER_CD\\" AS \\"USER_CD\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"USER_NAME\\" AS \\"USER_NAME\\" " +"FROM " +" USER_MST " +"WHERE " +" USER_MST.\\"USER_CD\\" = ?"
"SELECT " +" USER_MST.\\"USER_CD\\" AS \\"USER_CD\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"USER_NAME\\" AS \\"USER_NAME\\" " +"FROM " +" USER_MST " +"WHERE " +" USER_MST.\\"USER_CD\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" M_CUST.\\"CUR_CD\\" AS \\"CUR_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_CUST.\\"EXCH_TYP\\") AS \\"EXCH_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_CUST.\\"DETAIL_ROUND_TYP\\") AS \\"DETAIL_ROUND_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_CUST.\\"INSPC_ACPT_TYP\\") AS \\"INSPC_ACPT_TYP\\" " +"FROM " +" M_CUST, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"WHERE " +" M_CUST.COMPANY_CD = SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD " +" AND SYS_MY_COMPANY.CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM' " +" AND M_CUST.\\"CUST_CD\\" = ?"
"SELECT " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"CODE\\" AS \\"CODE\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE " +"WHERE " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"SYS_CLASS\\" = 'SALES' " +" AND SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"CLASS_CODE\\" = 'PLANT_WEB'"

"SELECT " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_CD\\" AS \\"CUR_CD\\", " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_UNIT\\" AS \\"CUR_UNIT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_CUR.\\"DECIMAL_FIG\\") AS \\"DECIMAL_FIG\\" " +"FROM " +" M_CUR, " +" M_CUST, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"WHERE " +" M_CUR.CUR_CD = M_CUST.CUR_CD " +" AND M_CUST.COMPANY_CD = SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD " +" AND SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM' " +" AND M_CUST.\\"CUST_CD\\" = ?"
"SELECT " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" AS \\"STOCK_UNIT\\" " +"FROM " +" M_ITEM " +"WHERE " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"
"SELECT " +" T_SALES.APPR_FLG " +"FROM " +" T_SALES " +"WHERE " +" T_SALES.DEL_FLG = 0 " +" AND T_SALES.APPR_FLG <> 1 " +" AND T_SALES.SLIP_CD = ?"
"SELECT " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"INSTALL_FLG\\" AS \\"INSTALL_FLG\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS " +"WHERE " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"OPTION_ID\\" = 'AiR'"

"INSERT INTO " +" T_SALES(\\"SALES_SEQ_NO\\", \\"SLIP_CD\\", \\"SALES_TYP\\", \\"CUST_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"ITEM_NAME\\", \\"CUST_ODR_NO\\", \\"SALES_DATE\\", \\"SALES_DEPT_CD\\", \\"VEND_CD\\", \\"PRD_ODR_PLACE_CD\\", \\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\", \\"ODR_ACPT_PSN_CD\\", \\"SALES_QTY\\", \\"SALES_UNIT_PRICE\\", \\"UNIT_CD\\", \\"SALES_AMOUNT\\", \\"SALES_AMOUNT_EXCH_RATES\\", \\"INSPC_ACPT_DATE\\", \\"INSPC_ACPT_QTY\\", \\"EXTERNAL_TAX_SALES_AMOUNT\\", \\"INTERNAL_TAX_SALES_AMOUNT\\", \\"TAXFREE_SALES_AMOUNT\\", \\"TAX_CREDIT_SALES_AMOUNT\\", \\"EXTERNAL_TAX_AMOUNT\\", \\"INTERNAL_TAX_AMOUNT\\", \\"TAX_AMOUNT_1\\", \\"TAX_AMOUNT_2\\", \\"TAX_AMOUNT_3\\", \\"OWN_CUR_TAXCREDIT_SALES_AMOUNT\\", \\"ORG_SLIP_CD\\", \\"CURRNCY_CD\\", \\"SPCL_PRICE_CO\\", \\"REMARKS\\", \\"INSPC_ACPT_TYP\\", \\"STATUS\\", \\"DEL_FLG\\", \\"APPR_FLG\\", \\"APPR_ID\\", \\"APPR_DATE\\") " +"VALUES " +" (TO_NUMBER(?), ?, TO_NUMBER(?), ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), ?, TO_DATE(?))"

"update " +" T_SALES " +"set " +" \\"SLIP_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"SALES_TYP\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"CUST_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"ITEM_NAME\\" = ?, " +" \\"CUST_ODR_NO\\" = ?, " +" \\"SALES_DATE\\" = to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), " +" \\"SALES_DEPT_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"VEND_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"PRD_ODR_PLACE_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"ODR_ACPT_PSN_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"SALES_QTY\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"SALES_UNIT_PRICE\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"UNIT_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"SALES_AMOUNT\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"SALES_AMOUNT_EXCH_RATES\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"INSPC_ACPT_DATE\\" = to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), " +" \\"INSPC_ACPT_QTY\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"EXTERNAL_TAX_SALES_AMOUNT\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"INTERNAL_TAX_SALES_AMOUNT\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"TAXFREE_SALES_AMOUNT\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"TAX_CREDIT_SALES_AMOUNT\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"EXTERNAL_TAX_AMOUNT\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"INTERNAL_TAX_AMOUNT\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"TAX_AMOUNT_1\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"TAX_AMOUNT_2\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"TAX_AMOUNT_3\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"OWN_CUR_TAXCREDIT_SALES_AMOUNT\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"ORG_SLIP_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"CURRNCY_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"SPCL_PRICE_CO\\" = ?, " +" \\"REMARKS\\" = ?, " +" \\"INSPC_ACPT_TYP\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"STATUS\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"DEL_FLG\\" = to_number(?) " +"where " +" T_SALES.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0 " +" and T_SALES.\\"SALES_SEQ_NO\\" = ?"
"SELECT " +" TO_CHAR(SEQ_SERVICE_SEQ_NO.NEXTVAL) AS \\"CTL_SEQ_CD\\" " +"FROM " +" DUAL"
"SELECT " +" TO_CHAR(SEQ_HS_SERVICE_SEQ_NO.NEXTVAL) AS \\"HS_CTL_SEQ_CD\\" " +"FROM " +" DUAL"

"UPDATE " +" T_SERVICE " +"SET " +" T_SERVICE.\\"SLIP_TRN_CD\\" = ?, " +" T_SERVICE.\\"SALES_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), " +" T_SERVICE.\\"SALES_DEPT_CD\\" = ?, " +" T_SERVICE.\\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\" = ?, " +" T_SERVICE.\\"UNIT_COST\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" T_SERVICE.\\"SERVICE_AMOUNT\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" T_SERVICE.\\"SERVICE_AMOUNT_EXCH_RATES\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" T_SERVICE.\\"TAX_CD\\" = ?, " +" T_SERVICE.\\"REMARKS\\" = ?, " +" T_SERVICE.\\"WORK_TIME\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" T_SERVICE.\\"RATE_PAY\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" T_SERVICE.\\"WORK_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), " +" T_SERVICE.\\"WORK_PERSON_CD\\" = ?, " +" T_SERVICE.\\"WORK_REMARKS\\" = ? " +"WHERE " +" T_SERVICE.\\"CTL_SEQ_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_SERVICE.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = '0'"
"UPDATE " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK " +"SET " +" \\"ODR_CMPLT_FLG\\" = '0', " +" \\"ODR_CMPLT_DATE\\" = null " +"WHERE " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = '0' " +" AND T_ODR_UNSTOCK.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ?"
"UPDATE " +" T_SERVICE " +"SET " +" T_SERVICE.\\"SLIP_TRN_CD\\" = ?, " +" T_SERVICE.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = '1' " +"WHERE " +" T_SERVICE.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ? " +" AND T_SERVICE.\\"CTL_SEQ_CD\\" = ?"
"SELECT " +" M_TAX.\\"TAX_CD\\" AS \\"TAX_CD\\" " +"FROM " +" M_TAX " +"WHERE " +" M_TAX.\\"TAX_CD\\" = ?"
"SELECT " +" MODIFY_COUNT " +"FROM " +" T_ODR_UNSTOCK " +"WHERE " +" ODR_NO = ?"
